name: steady stockinette hat
sizes_available: newborn, baby, toddler, child, (adult small, medium, large)
notes:
the basic stockinette hat that i just can’t stop making. after making one of these hats for everyone in my family, i decided it was time to figure out the pattern for any size i’d need. includes slouchy and fitted lengths. enjoy knitting your steady stockinette hat!

sizes:
newborn, baby, toddler, child, (adult small, medium, large)
this hat is intended to have 1-2 inches (2.5-5 cm) of negative ease.

circumference inches: 12, 15, 17, 18 (19, 20, 22) or 30.5, 38, 43, 46 (48, 50, 56) cm.

yarn requirements: 
dk weight yarn, i used hedgehog fibers tweedy (100g = 250 yards)

88, 125, 175, 190, (237, 275, 325) yards

us size #3 (3.25 mm) circular needles, or needles needed to get gauge. hat can be knit in magic loop or dpns

gauge:
21 sts x 32 rows = 4 inches (10 cm) in stockinette.

notions:
5 removable stitch markers, tapestry needle, scissors.

pattern offers 3 instructions for creating the brim and fitted and slouchy lengths.
